title: Negative Pledge
content: The Borrower shall not created or permit to subsist any Security over any of its assets.

title: Events of Default
content: Non-payment: The Obligor does not pay on the due date any amount payable pursuant to a Finance Document.

title: Change of Control
content: If any person or group of persons acting in concert gains control of the Borrower.

title: Governing Law
content: This Agreement and any non-contractual obligations arising out of or in connection with it are governed by English law.
